content: As an optional character you can meet, the Man-in-Stone can easily be missed, but shouldn't if you want to unlock an important spell. He's located in a small crevice of the Fright Cliff, found by heading to the right of the Squall Hideout below a large ruin.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone'.
The content is as follows:
As an optional character you can meet, the Man-in-Stone can easily be missed, but shouldn't if you want to unlock an important spell. He's located in a small crevice of the Fright Cliff, found by heading to the right of the Squall Hideout below a large ruin.
